description: This chapter focuses on Boaz meeting the nearer kinsman at the gate, the legal transaction for the land, Ruth's marriage to Boaz, the birth of Obed, and the genealogy leading to David.

questions.question: Where did Boaz go and sit down?
Who came by that way?
options: The kinsman of whom Boaz spake

questions.question: How did Boaz call to him?
What did Boaz say to the kinsman?
How many men did Boaz take?
Who did Boaz take?
options: Ten men of the elders of the city

questions.question: What did Boaz say to the elders?
What did Boaz say to the kinsman about Naomi?
options: Naomi, that is come again out of the country of Moab, selleth a parcel of land, which was our brother Elimelech's

questions.question: Why did Boaz think to advertise him?
options: Buy it before the inhabitants, and before the elders of my people

questions.question: What options did Boaz give him?
options: If thou wilt redeem it, redeem it: but if thou wilt not redeem it, then tell me, that I may know

questions.question: Who did Boaz say could redeem it besides him?
options: For there is none to redeem it beside thee; and I am after thee

questions.question: What did the kinsman say?
What did Boaz say he must also buy when buying the field?
options: Also of Ruth the Moabitess, the wife of the dead, to raise up the name of the dead upon his inheritance

questions.question: Why did the kinsman say he could not redeem it?
options: I cannot redeem it for myself, lest I mar mine own inheritance

questions.question: What did the kinsman say to Boaz?
options: Redeem thou my right to thyself

questions.question: What was the manner in former time in Israel?
options: A man plucked off his shoe, and gave it to his neighbour

questions.question: What was this for?
What was this in Israel?
What did the kinsman say to Boaz?
What did the kinsman do?
Who did Boaz speak to?
options: The elders, and unto all the people

questions.question: What did Boaz say he had bought?
options: All that was Elimelech's, and all that was Chilion's and Mahlon's, of the hand of Naomi

questions.question: What did Boaz say he had purchased Ruth for?
Why did Boaz purchase Ruth?
options: That the name of the dead be not cut off from among his brethren, and from the gate of his place

questions.question: How did Boaz refer to Ruth?
options: Ruth the Moabitess, the wife of Mahlon

questions.question: Who spoke to Boaz?
options: All the people that were in the gate, and the elders

questions.question: What did the people and elders say?
Who did the people and elders say the woman should be like?
Who did the people and elders say built the house of Israel?
Where did the people and elders say Boaz should be worthy and famous?
options: Worthily in Ephratah, and be famous in Beth-lehem
Worthily in Judah, and be famous in Israel
Worthily in Moab, and be famous in Beth-lehem
Worthily in Canaan, and be famous in Ephratah

questions.question: Whose house did they say his house should be like?
options: Like the house of Pharez, whom Tamar bare unto Judah
Like the house of Joseph, whom Rachel bare unto Jacob
Like the house of Levi, whom Leah bare unto Jacob
Like the house of Jacob, whom Rebekah bare unto Isaac

questions.question: What did Boaz do to Ruth?
What happened when Boaz went in unto her?
options: The LORD gave her conception, and she bare a son

questions.question: Who did the women say should be blessed?
options: The LORD, which hath not left thee this day without a kinsman

questions.question: Whose name did the women say should be famous in Israel?
What did the women say Obed should be to her?
options: A restorer of thy life, and a nourisher of thine old age

questions.question: Who did the women say was better than seven sons?
options: Thy daughter in law, which loveth thee, which is better to thee than seven sons

questions.question: What did Naomi do with the child?
options: Took the child, and laid it in her bosom, and became nurse unto it

questions.question: What name did the women neighbors give it?
Who did the women say Obed was the father of?
options: The father of Jesse, the father of David
The father of Joseph, the father of Jacob
The father of Samuel, the father of Elkanah
The father of Solomon, the father of David
